radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild diffuse cerebellar atrophy, slightly enlarged right temporal horn, suggestive of a relatively small right temporal lobe
Slight decreases in N-acetylaspartate concentrations in the left mesial temporal region, suggestive of loss of neuronal elements
Decrease in right temporal lobe use of fluorodeoxyglucose, suggestive of decreased metabolic activity in that region
Left temporal and left central slow wave activity suggestive of localized cortical injury, rare left temporal interictal epileptiform discharges
Multiple seizures showing a bicentral high-amplitude spike and wave discharge, indicative of a mesial frontal origin
